desc: We produce great-tasting, honest drinks bursting with natural fruit flavour. Our small team in Devon have been making authentic squashes for over 30 years from just fruit, sugar, water. You won’t find artificial sweeteners in any of our drinks - just bucket loads of taste!

layout.text:
Free yourself and your family from artificial soft drinks! At Rocks, we only use organic whole fruit and the fewest, most natural ingredients possible.
Simply squished whole fruit for full, flavoursome taste excitement and Devonshire spring water for pure refreshment.
